= Darktable =
Darktable is a great OpenSource workflow editor. Like adobe Lightroom, but for Linux.

= Get the Software =

You need to add the DarkTable ppa (assuming you are  running Ubuntu) this is accomplished like this

 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:pmjdebruijn/darktable-release

Once you have got that setup

   sudo apt-get update
   sudo apt-get install darktable

== Purge ==
Sometime it is necessary to purge
